ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | blocn.8 | |- C = ( IndMet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | blocn.d | |- D = ( IndMet ` W ) |
| 3 |  | blocn.j | |- J = ( MetOpen ` C ) |
| 4 |  | blocn.k | |- K = ( MetOpen ` D ) |
| 5 |  | blocn.5 | |- B = ( U BLnOp W ) |
| 6 |  | blocn.u | |- U e. NrmCVec |
| 7 |  | blocn.w | |- W e. NrmCVec |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( U LnOp W ) = ( U LnOp W ) |
| 9 | 8, 5 | #P_bloln | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec /\ T e. B ) -> T e. ( U LnOp W ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 7, 9 | #P_mp3an12 | |- ( T e. B -> T e. ( U LnOp W ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 | #P_blocn | |- ( T e. ( U LnOp W ) -> ( T e. ( J Cn K ) <-> T e. B ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_biimprd | |- ( T e. ( U LnOp W ) -> ( T e. B -> T e. ( J Cn K ) ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_mpcom | |- ( T e. B -> T e. ( J Cn K ) ) |
